website_summaries.verdict: The Contour+ sports camera is simple to use, with pro-level flexibility and quality; however, Contour's lower-priced options may be more appropriate for casual users.
pros: The Contour+ sports camera is highly configurable, yet also extremely easy to pick up and use
An included Connect View card allows the Contour+ to connect to Contour's iPhone app for live viewfinding and settings adjustments
HDMI output, microphone input, and Bluetooth connectivity offer expandability
cons: The Contour+ is noticeably more expensive than the competition and Contour's other models
The flush-mounted lens glass seems vulnerable to scratching

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use it to film all of my outdoor adventures. It is tough and does a great job. The picture is very clear and the sound is impressive. I am not an expert with video equipment or processing it after recorded, but have been happy with the camera and software. I can get it recorded and get it into a format for youtube or my iphone or computer fairly easily. I wouldn't trust it to be very water resistant without the additional case.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Contour Camera
customer_reviews.text: I sure like this little camera and I'm still thinking up ways to mount it and places to use it. It is a great spy camera if you want one because of it's small size and being battery operated. And it has great color. The only thing I don't like is having to erase the data card; I can never remember how to do it so I have to take out the manual again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We love this little thing however securing it to a ski helmet is difficult, there is no way to put it stationary on any kind of curved surface, therefore you always get the shake when you use it this way because you have to strap it to your goggle strap,not to the helmet, it is also very wide which can be good and bad. WB is great, picture quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Great POV camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this camera mostly to film my action shooting competition matches. Mounted to my hearing protection, it rocks in showing me where I can change my strategy and pick up more time. It's light and I've been able to shoot 3 shooters through a whole day of competition. I wish this one had the one button on and record, I think the newer + does that.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great picture. Very stable even when used as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Very stable even when used as a helmet cam for skiing and inline skating. The angle adjust on the lens is great for helmet cam work, since it can cancel the tilt of the camera being at an angle on my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Waydick

customer_reviews.title: Check the curretn crop of video cameras for better pricing and features
customer_reviews.text: Much better options at less cost; with better features now available
customer_reviews.author: R. TEMPLIN

customer_reviews.title: Contour+ Plus Camera
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I had to have this camera. Camera arrived dead. I went to Contours site, they are out of business so no support, only firmware software updates. Product returned.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good thing. That I bought. The price is low, cheap and reasonable. I am very happy to received such great thing.
customer_reviews.author: materler

customer_reviews.title: great while it works, customer service unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera only to have it break two months after purchasing it. In order to fix/replace the camera, you have to email tech support (only the online store has a phone number to call, and it's always an answering machine). But tech support is very slow to respond to emails - over a week with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Quarnstrom

customer_reviews.title: Contour+
customer_reviews.text: The camera looked brand new. Works perfect. I wasn't sure about buying a video camera used but in this case it worked out great. The camera is small and light but seems very well built. I will say though be careful when you attach the camera to the various mount. It's kind of easy to side it on but sliding it back off can be tough. I'm hoping it gets easier with use. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Held

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor service support poor quality-Look at a GoPro before buying this camera
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes this camera records sound and sometimes does not. It also will show a thumbnail for a data file and when an attempt is made to open the file nothing is there(so your'e effectivly screwed out of your special moment). How can there be a thumbnail but no data file? The most irritating thing is when you call contour you only get a recording and my calls are not being returned. Look at a GoPro for sure before buying a contour cmera.
customer_reviews.author: ipwac1

customer_reviews.title: Contour+ from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this camera in the field but from what tests I've done I'm amazed at the quality of the video content. I'm planning to use this while hiking and climbing in New Zealand later this year and I'm certain it will provide me with a fantastic record of my trip. I have yet to test the length of the battery, some say it's good for two hours and others for three. Whatever, I have two spares so I'm sure this is all going to be good.
customer_reviews.author: roysta49

customer_reviews.title: Test
customer_reviews.text: We took the camera to Bridge Day at New River Gorge and the camera worked very good. It was on the side of my hard hat while rappeling down a rope! Camera is easy to use and video is very clear set to extend battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Contour, but never again. DO NOT BUY Contour products... Yes they are awesome looking, yes they work well. BUT, If you have any issues with it, There is NO CUSTOMER SERVICE. They have zero phone numbers only an email. I have been waiting for a response 6 months now. I threw my camera in the trash and got a Go-Pro. Do not go through what i did, its not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports video capture
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this helmet cam. I have used it for skiing. I mount it to my goggle strap because I often ski through trees and I believe it could be knocked off my helmet by a branch if mounted on the top of my helmet. It tracks GPS data and the supplied software can display your trajectory (x, y, z) and speed. The Contour video software is rudimentary, but I import the .mov video files into Pinnacle Studio and add music and titles to produce a high quality video presentation. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Junky. Power button doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for video while flying in planes. They are an ambitious company, but this version is not very good. The power button is so bad they have a video on their site entitled "why doesn't my power button work?" Well, I just followed their directions on how to re-assemble this $400 camera for them when in fact it should be a warranty repair, and now the power button is completely non-functional! I can't recommend this product- it just wasn't ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! The camera has the perfect balance of size, style and professional 1080p quality. The new 170° wide-angle lens makes all the difference in putting your audience in the athletes shoes and cuts back on the jello rolling shutter issues of other helmet cameras. Last but not least it's slick look makes it so it doesn't look silly if it appears in other camera angles or if you want to wear it on the slopes or at the track. Definitely the future of POV cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just tried this in Germany!!! Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this camera out in Winterberg at the Dirt Masters event. The video that came from the Contour Plus was the best I've seen from any helmet camera out there. I was on the fence about which camera to go with (I have tried them all) but the Contour Plus is second to none. Bravo on the 170 deg field of view!! This camera is a game changer and a must for the core sports enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: TruckeeSasha

customer_reviews.title: RIch Color
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Contour Plus camera yesterday. `editing a home movie tonite and posting it on Contour.com - without editing/color correcting, the video i shot is extremely rich in color and the 170 deg helps a ton. Great price for such a next generation camera... LOVE IT. Everyone needs this camera. Thank you Contour!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SW King

customer_reviews.title: Contour + is awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from riding my motorcycle and shooting with my new Contour +. I have to say I was blown away by the quality of the picture and with the ease of use. What a cool new era in camera technology. I am looking forward to all the great looking vids I will be able to shoot. Thanks Contour.
customer_reviews.author: GT

product_meta.title: Contour+ Plus Camera
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



The Contour+ captures beautiful 1080p video. It utilizes a 170° wide-angle rotating lens that delivers a true high quality image that captures all the action with minimal distortion and fish-eye. It records Full HD in all its glory.

PROFESSIONAL STORYTELLING
Professional storytelling demands the right tools and the right technology. Designed as our first hands-free camera for the true filmer, the Contour+ delivers both for this advanced segment with expanded capabilities and supplemental features. Packed with the highest level of progression of any hands-free to hit the market, Contour+ is made to capture not only the action but also the full story with depth, focus and clarity. The result is rich video from one camera with all the tools to do the job. 





CONTOUR+ PRODUCT FEATURES:
FIELD OF VISION
Stunning footage is what makes the shot and the Contour+ is specifically set up for capturing the perfect visual. The reason is a market-leading mix of tech functions from a six-element glass lens and 1080p video quality to adjustable white balance for dialing in the details of each location. The Contour+ also expands normal perspective with a F 2.8, superwide-angle lens, integrating peripherals and backdrops that get cropped with a narrower focus. 

FULLY CONNECTED
With all our modern devices, connection is key—so we’ve made the Contour+ the most connected POV camera ever. First up is Bluetooth, which provides filmmakers a wireless viewfinder to check the angle on their phone before dropping in. The camera also connects via an HDMI port, allowing instant replay on a laptop or widescreen direct from the microSD card. The upside is eliminating the lag time of downloads and transfers when checking footage on location or back home.

LIVE ACTION
Action moves at real time, so why deal with a delay in the coverage? The Contour+ enables live streaming—via HDMI and external transmitter—creating a direct connection to film shoots, event coverage and contest runs. Whether for broadcast or simply building a following, this capability allows filmers and athletes to provide an inside window when the action is happening. No other hands-free can make this claim, so grab this one if you’re headed to the X Games.

CRISP AUDIO
Video is only one part of the story, which is why we’ve equipped the Contour+ with an external 2.5mm microphone jack. This crisp audio capability allows you to interview characters from friends and fellow athletes to random people that appear in your shots. And, by capturing dialogue that gets said in the heat of the moment, you’ll add an additional standout quality to segments and stories. It’s a tool utilized by true pros that we thought you might need. Just keep it clean. 




ADDITIONAL PRODUCT FEATURES
GPS
Location is a central element of any story and the GPS receiver in the Contour+ tracks exact location, speed and altitude while shooting in hands-free HD. The slick feature links personal footage to a specific place and adds interactive depth to your story. 

STORAGE
Running short on space is a huge hassle, which is why the Contour+ stacks all your footage on a removable microSD card. Compatible with cards up to 32 gigs, the setup allows an easy swap to a fresh card when you’ve filled the first one to capacity.

STRENGTH
With a burly, water-resistant aluminum shell, the Contour+ is made to take a beating in extreme environments from raging storms to muddy tracks. For full submersion sports add the waterproof case to keep it dry up to 60 meters deep(available summer 2011). 

 MOUNTS 
Dialing in the ideal angle is a critical component to capturing unique footage. Contour+ makes it easy with custom body, gear or vehicle mounts for the full spectrum of sports from shooting and skiing to high-octane motorized activities. 
See all contour mounts






VIDEO FORMATS
Video Format Resolution Frame Rate 
Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 30 fps To capture those awesome moments in the highest resolution available. Tall HD 960p 1280 x 960 30 fps For those sports like surfing that are better suited to a taller image. Action HD 720p 1280 x 720 60 fps When frame rate is more important than resolution. The perfect setting to capture the fastest action. It reduces blur and rolling shutter effect. Contour 720p 1280 x 720 30 fps When space on your card is at a premium and you need to record that last epic adventure. Still Photo 2592 x 1944 3, 5, 10, 30 or 60 sec When you want to freeze frame the action, the photo mode is your perfect shot. You can pick from 5 rates to best capture that moment. 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
